name: SPYRAL Super Agent
effectText: If this card is in your hand: You can declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap); reveal the top card of your opponent's Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card if it is a card of that type. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "SPYRAL" card: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "SPYRAL Super Agent" once per turn.
